I Am A: Lawful Good Human Paladin (4th Level)

Ability Scores:
Strength-15
Dexterity-14
Constitution-15
Intelligence-15
Wisdom-15
Charisma-16

Alignment:
Lawful Good A lawful good character acts as a good person is expected or required to act. He combines a commitment to oppose evil with the discipline to fight relentlessly. He tells the truth, keeps his word, helps those in need, and speaks out against injustice. A lawful good character hates to see the guilty go unpunished. Lawful good is the best alignment you can be because it combines honor and compassion. However, lawful good can be a dangerous alignment because it restricts freedom and criminalizes self-interest.

Race:
Humans are the most adaptable of the common races. Short generations and a penchant for migration and conquest have made them physically diverse as well. Humans are often unorthodox in their dress, sporting unusual hairstyles, fanciful clothes, tattoos, and the like.

Class:
Paladins take their adventures seriously, and even a mundane mission is, in the heart of the paladin, a personal test an opportunity to demonstrate bravery, to learn tactics, and to find ways to do good. Divine power protects these warriors of virtue, warding off harm, protecting from disease, healing, and guarding against fear. The paladin can also direct this power to help others, healing wounds or curing diseases, and also use it to destroy evil. Experienced paladins can smite evil foes and turn away undead. A paladin's Wisdom score should be high, as this determines the maximum spell level that they can cast. Many of the paladin's special abilities also benefit from a high Charisma score.

So, there's the high school dream.  The reason it's cliche is most people have them.  My dream always starts the same.

It's the second semester of school, and it's time for finals.  Problem is, I have no fucking clue where my finals are.  Seriously, none.  Mainly cause I've never been to class.  So I have to run around the damn school praying that I'll find my class in time.  Mainly cause it's senior year, and my class hasn't graduated.  Turns out somehow everything got screwed up and we only THOUGHT we graduated.  And despite not having gone to class, I'm fairly sure I'll be fine as long as I can bullshit the exam.

Then it variates from there.  Sometimes the others are androids.  Sometimes they're brainwashed.  Hell, once a demon popped in with a leather jacket like he was fuckin' Fonzie or some shit.  And then I wake up.
http://modernyeti.livejournal.com/41653.html

Wow, so I suppose we've all heard about the Micheal 'Cosmo Kramer' Richards tyrade.  If not, just google it and click the news entry.  You'll find the video soon enough.  I talked about it with my mom today, and man...  She's just not crazy about the black folk.  I found myself saying things like "you know, they have the vote now, right?"  "It's not acceptable to call them negro's anymore."  Or, my personal favorite "we can drink from the same water fountains now."

I have no real point to this, especially since you can google just about every opinion on racism and prejudice that's ever existed.

Also, the school bus thing...  I have nothing.  I heard about it and went "damn.  That sucks.  What's for dinner?"  As it turns out... I don't know any of the people in the wreck.  Hell, all the people I knew from school finally graduated last year.  So....  Yeah....

Osu!  Tatakae!  Ouendan is fun.  Hard.  Damned hard.  Damned fun.  Just put asside some extra cash to buy a new DS when you throw your's against the wall cause of Ready Steady Go (yes, the full metal alachamest theme).
http://modernyeti.livejournal.com/41240.html

What up, kiddie winks? Your old unca yeti here with sme news 'bout himself. First off, I'm now 23. Raise the trumpets and sound the flags. That's right, me birthday was recently. Try and guess what day it was.

I'm not going to list the details of my birthday, but let's just put it as surreal. Yes, surreal sounds sarcastic enough.

I'm currently in a new D&D game. Soulknives are fun.

I have a DS Lite, which I acquired for my date of birth. My dad has played it more than I have. Seriously. That has changed now, due to him buying his OWN DS Lite. His is white, mine is black. How cute.

I have the shits like a madman.
http://modernyeti.livejournal.com/41177.html

001. What is Your Name? Ben

002. How old are you? 22

003. What is the link to your website, blog, or myspace? www.myspace.com/zigfb

004. Gender? I'm a dude, she's a dude, we're all dudes, yeah!

005. IF you were born the oppisite sex what would your name be? Apparently my parents were torn between Kristin and Shanaynay

006. Age you act? I'm only twee and hawf years owd

007. Grade? A, baby.


008. Age you want to be? 23, so's I can gets the presents from my birthday (I'm greedy, shut it)

009. Righty or lefty?  Uh, the first one.

Love and stuff

010. Single? Really?  Me too!

011. Who are you with, or who do you want to be with? No one, but man...  I wouldn't mind a female right now.

012. Have you ever been in love, if so how many times? Yes, but that's a touchy subject....

013. How many were sexual? ... none...  

014. When was the last time you played truth or dare? Around three years ago.

015. Who did you play with? Bethany, Alan, and some other folk.  Mostly Bethany's freinds.  Think Haley and Karissa were there.

016. What was the last dare you had to? Press ham against the window of Comic Corner (fuck you, Alan.)

017. Do you beleive you should be in love to have sex? I wasn't...

018. How far have you gone? Further than down the hall, I'll tell you that much.

Right at this moment...

019. Where are you? At my house (not to be confused with my appartment)

020. What can you see out your window? Instead of a big dark blur I see a big light blur.

021. Are you lonely or tired? Tizzired.

022. Use 5 words to decribe how you are feeling: Tired, hungry, copasetic, bored, thinking.

023. Are you talking to anyone online? Nope.

024. What are you doing? Answering your damn survey, bitch.

030. Do you smoke? No.  Allergic.

031. Do you have low self-esteem?: Sometimes.  Everyone goes through their down moments.

032. Have you ever been to NYC? You mean the City That Never Sleeps? The Big Apple?  The city so nice they named it twice?  Why no, I haven't.  Thanks for asking though.

033. Do you have any birthmarks? No.

034. Do you get online a lot? How else do I play WoW?

035. have you ever pulled an all nighter? where?  Tons of times and all over.  I work nights.

036. When was last time you skinny dipped? I don't.

037. Who were you with? No one.

038. What is a secret people would be surprised knowing? I'm not afraid of clowns.

039. Have you ever looked at porn? I had a computer and a phone line when I went through puberty.  I'd say that's a pretty definate maybe.

040. Do you sleep with the room door open or closed? Closed...  I hate open doors.

041. Do you have a curfew? Pffft, no.

042. Do you have a cell phone? Sure do.

043. What name brand of clothes do you wear the most? Big Dog.  Cause I'm a fat ass.

044. Do you like takin pictures? Sometimes.

045. Do you like gettin your picture taken? Yeti's hate having their picture taken.

046. Do you have your own pool? No.

047. Do you prefer boxers or briefs? "They're Hanes.  Let's leave it at that."  Name that quote.

048. Are you overweight?: Just a tad.

049. Do you have a lot of ex's? A few...

050. What does your ex bf/gf look like? A girl.

051. What was the last compliment you recieved? You're a cute little baby, yes you are.

052. Do you like getting dirty? Physically or metaphorically?

053. Are you flexiable? Surprisingly for someone of my size.

054. Would you ever date someone younger than you? Yes.

055. Would you ever date someone older than you? Only a few years older.

056. When was the last time you were drunk? About three years ago.

057. When was the last time you went on a date? About two years ago.

058. Do you ever cry to get your way? Not since I found that limited edition action figure of Wolverine in plain clothes....

059. Are you the romantic type? I try to be.

060. Do you enjoy talking about gross, disturbing things?: ::grin::

061. What do you like least about your body? Probably my freakishly huge penis.  I kid, I kid.  Not really.  I'm just joshing ya.

062. Do you ever wear shirts do show your belly? Hell no....

063. What about cleavage? I was drunk and she was hot...

064. Is your best friend a virgin? BWAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAnoHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA

065. What size shoe do you wear? 16, baby.  Please refer to #61 for reference.

066. When was the last time you were at a party? Everyday's a party....  2000....  Bite me...

067. Has there ever been a rumor spread about you? Look what a man, a woman, another woman, a llama, and a bucket of barbecue sauce do in the privacy of their own backyards is nobody's buisness but their's, got it?

068. Are you more of a mommys or daddys child? Mommy's....  Definately Mommy's....

069. Would you ever hook up with the same sex? "You'd better turn that gas up.  Cause I either wanna love it or not remember it at all."  Name that quote.

070. How many true friends do you have? Ah, paranoia, my old dear friend.

071. Who is your best friend? Christina

072. How old are they? 20

073. Do you prefer to hang out with one friend or a group of friends? Depends on the mood.

074. Who do you wish you were closer to? You, baby.  Rawr.

075. Who knows the most about you? Either the government with their survelance devices or the aliens with their mental probabing....

076. Who do you trust the most? Why, paranoia.  You've come to visit again.

077. Who do you talk to on the phone the most? Whoever the fuck calls me when I'm sleeping and I'm trying to get rid of them.  (Christina, I'm glaring at you.)

078. Name one who's arms you feel safe in: Dolph Lundgren.  He's so manly.  (F.Y.I. He was HeMan in the Masters of the Universe movie.  That's the joke.)

079. Who house were you at last? My own.

Have you ever

080. Spun until you were so dizzy you couldn't walk? Childhood.

081. Screamed so much you lost your voice? A few times...  Anger, gotta love it.

082. Played strip poker? Heh, yeah...

083. Stripped to your underwear while playing stip poker? Heh, no...

084. Had a medical emergency? Yeah.  Nearly bought the farm and slaughtered the pigs too.  Mmmmm, bacon....

085. Done something extremely unexpected? Vesectimy

086. Been onstage? A few times, grudgingly....

More...

087. Whats your biggest fear? Fish and heights.

088. Do you share a room with anyone? Real or imaginary?

089. Scariest dream? I kept waking up to demons staring me in the eye and yelling "boo."

090. What was your best dream? I kept waking up to demons staring me in the eye and yelling "boo."

091. Would you date some one 5 years older than you?  That's my limit, actually.

092. Are you clean-shaven?: Not at the moment.

093. What you greatest strength? 300 pounds.

094. What does your underwear look like? Blue.

095. Do you have any bad habits? A few.

096. If you could hurt any body who would it be and why? Oh, the list goes on and on.  Too many to name here, and all most all of the reasons are petty.  But there is that sonuvabitch Heath Ledger.  He can kiss my fat ass.

097. What are your addictions / What do you love? "Hey, I don't have an addicive personality."  Name that quote.

098. What's your most complimented feature(s)? I don't have one.

099. Do you think life has been good so far? Some yes, some no.

100. What did you do last night? Watched Ghostbusters and Ghostbusters II.

101. Is sex an uncomfortable topic for you? Depends on which one you talk about...

102. Have you ever worn makeup? Fucking grade school plays.

103. How much money do you have right now? some....

104. Have you ever gone three days without showering? Yes.

105. Do you have a rubber bracelet? No.  I like to keep my masculenity on my sleave, along with my dandriff.

Ok, Japan.  I want to know what the hell is wrong with you.  One of your stars, a man known as Katori Shingo, produces what is perhaps the funniest thing I've seen in years, Rolling Bomber Special, and turns around and produces what is probably the most disturbing thing I saw from about three years ago, Shingo Mama no Ohha.  Wasn't it bad enough that you had Governor Arnold as an energy drink spokesman?  Didn't you do enough harm when you made a former NFL player into a number one pop star?  Do you think the world will ever recover from your country being the backfrop for Bill Murray's comeback movie?  Japan, stop drinking your water.  It's laced with something.  Instead, import.  It not only helps the world's economy, you could also use a drink of something that won't cause you to come up with new tenticle porn OAVs.

Well, kids.  Here's an update of my life so far.  

I've got a pretty boring job working security.  I sit and do nothing for 8 - 10 hours while getting paid.  It's not hard at all and if I'm not careful I might get a bit of excercise out of it.

I've gotten my hands on some pretty good live action, including a bad ass show called Garo.  Also, I'm subtitling the Initial D movie by myself.  Might even pick up some chinese outta this.

I watched Kung Fu Hustle.  Bad ass little film, but I actually liked Shaolin Soccer better.  Still, worth a purchase and DEFINATELY worth the rental.

I asked out a girl recently.  Everything seems to be going well with that, inspite of her being married and all.  That one hit me outta left field, man.

And, finally, I'm hanging out with Laura tomorrow.  Oh what wacky hijinks will insue.

Whelp, that's all.  I'll leave you crazy cats and kittens alone.  Later.

I notice a whole heapin' mess of people doing "what I'm thankful for" posts.  Well, I'm not gonna.  Not out of protest, but not out of lazyness either.  

And it's not that I don't have stuff to be thankful for.  It's just that people have gotten pretty deep with their posts on the subject.  While I respect that, I refuse to go that path as it's really mostly stuff that's my buisiness.  Whole lotta in-jokes that are best left in, you know?  At the sametime, I'm not gonna go with the shallow "I'm thankful Capcom released Resident Evil and the Classics collection" type stuff.  Sure, I likes me some games, but that makes the occassion feel cheapened.  

I could go into the whole "white man killed the red man" type of rant, but really I never was conscious enough in history to give an account.  I'll leave that for Christina (indian) or Eric (history 'buff').  

I could go through the trouble, like Lira, of associating songs with most of you...  That takes a whole lot of time in explaining why and, honestly, I like listening to my music.  Assosciating songs is something I promised myself I'd never do again, as it's the perfect recipe for angst later on down the line.  

So, when it comes down to it, I'm thankful for things and if I choose to let you know what those things are, I'll let you.  Anyway, back to FireFly.  

Later kiddies.  

Oh, and as a PS...  I got digits today.  Awesome like a possum.  

Peace out.

And thanks for reading this post, buggers.

Now, I know a lot of people won't believe this, but I actually like the Parappa the Rappa anime.  Actually, lately I've been up for ANYTHING that's not overly depressing or focusing on uninteresting and nonexisting plot *coughTenTencough* and tend to go for a light hearted comedy.  Parappa just doesn't have a plot.

However, I do bring shows that have really fantastic plots, wonderful writing, and beautiful visual shots...  Then they get shot down due to being mecha, live action, or the fact that I brought them (yes, I've heard things.)  See, stuff like that gets on my nerves.  "But Ben, you make fun of our stuff mercilessly."  Yeah, usually when I hear things like "Dear god, please vote for this so we don't have to watch any of the other stuff on here."  Now, granted, there are usually other things on the list by other people...  BUT THIS WAS SAID WHEN MY STUFF WAS THE ONLY THINGS THERE BESIDES ONE FRIGGIN' THING!!!

Then again, why am I ranting?  I barely even go to HAAS anymore...  Well, who said I was talking about HAAS?  Ok, apparently I said it...  But that's besides the point!  Personally, I believe you need to watch at least five episodes of a tv series before you know if it's good or not.  Usually.  Like, say, Kamen Rider Blade.  The first few episodes weren't all that great.  Then, all of a sudden, it had these very well written plot arcs, and ended in a way that I couldn't have expected but can't see ending any other way (until I see the movie.)

Another instance is Initial D.  The first few episodes were kinda not good...  Just the standard "oh gee, wonder if he's gonna wi-yeah, he won..." stuff.  The plot took off after that.  So I've been told.  I can't really get my hands on Initial D cause I hate having to hear aboout how awesome it is.  I'm borrowing it, I bought your lies, I know you think it's bad ass...  STOP TALKING!!

Honestly though, I just finished watching Excel Saga...  After god knows how many years...  I finally finished it...  And I managed to find the missing gags in the 24th episode.  It was hidden under the mat in Ali Baba's Bathroom.  Anyone who knows that reference (except Neil) will get a pack of cookies.  I am not fucking kidding.  I say except Neil cause I know he knows.  We still watch the show!!

After watching old episodes of You Can't Do That On Television, I honestly believe people should be slimed everytime you say I Don't Know or get water poured on them when you say water.  "Hey, you need a bath."

"Oh, ok.  Water."  ::splash::  "Wee!!  singing in the bathtuuuuuub!!!"

By the way, my predition for two posts earlier came true.  I also didn't get to do much of anything for April Fool's Day.  Seriously.  Didn't do anything for Saint Patrick's Day either.  Hell, I don't even do much for anything.  Although on July 7th I expect to be in Pennsylvania in a LOOOOONNNNNNNNNG line while Lira and her girlfriend do....  things....  I'm not sure what things, but things nonetheless.

And by the way, what the fuck is up?  Lira gets a girlfriend, Neil got..... laid.  Am I the ONLY person who didn't wind up with more than their fist this weekend!?  Actually, that's not bitching.  I just use that line every chance I can get cause I think it's hilarious.

But back to the original reason for this post...  It's currently 6:14 AM and I have to be up in four hours to attend a game...  FOUR HOURS!?  HOLY SHIT!!!  Sleep it is!

Disclaimer:  This wasn't a bitching whining post.  Please do not take it as such.  All names and instances recorded in this are factual until proven otherwise, as are all predctions for the future.  In the instance of a crash landing, please place your head between your legs and you lips firmly on your buttocks.  Please consult your doctor before the use of Yeti. Don't wiz on the electirc fence.

Today was a remarkable in that I took a dump.  Now, the act itself is remarkable, but the truly amzing thing was the smell peeling paint off the walls RIGHT BEFORE MY EYES!!  IT was unbeliavable!  And now I'm saddened because I doubt that tomorrow's anal offerings can not live up to the hype of today's massive fecal sacrifice.  However, when offering at the porceline altar, one must always try to give their best.  So tonight, bean burritos followed milk and deviled eggs.  I must be able to constantly top myself lest I never be number one.

In other words, I took a shit and it stunk.  I plan on taking another stinky one tomorrow.  Feel free to post comments.

Oh, and on a completely unrelated note (seriously, I nearly forgot to mention this and it has nothing to do with stool at all) Tokusou Sentai DekaRanger tai Abaranger is hilarious.  I just wish I had a better grasp on japanese than I do and am saddened that I am probably gonna have to wait a year or two to see it translated finally.

Hrmmm...  ok, this is probably gonna be a stress reliever post.  Be warned.  Ok, I've noticed disturbing trends in my current life that are very closely ressembling the last time things turned to shit.  "And bickety bam, the motherfucker is rubble."  So if I dissappear that means that one of four things are happening.

A.) Building a proverbial bomb shelter to wait things out.
B.) I'm trying to get things over with individually so they don't come at me all together.
C.) I managed to difuse the situation.
D.) Everything went to hell.  Again.

Now then, this is the only lj post I'll make on the subject due to the fact that documenting things didn't help me at all last time.  This time, I'm going to try things differently.  If things continue, I might have to bail out of the comic.  That seems to be the common thread.
